name: simple_pdf_reader
description: A simple PDF reader built with Vue 3

scripts.copy-docs: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.resolve('dist');const dest=path.resolve('docs');fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true});if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('copied dist to docs');}else{console.error('dist not found');process.exit(1);}"
scripts.build:docs: npm run build && npm run copy-docs
